name: PHARMAVITE LLC
sampleDescriptions: General concerns with proposed and discussed trade policies impacting dietary supplements (no specific legislation).
Full implementation of Designer Anabolic Steroids Control Act.
The Health Savings Act of 2017.  H.R. 1175/S/403.  Specifically as it relates to coverage of certain vitamin and dietary supplement product costs.

H.R. 3268/S.1603 FY 2018 Appropriations for the Department of Agriculture and Related Agencies. Specifically for adequate funding for dietary supplement regulation. Full implementation and enforcement
